reviewText: My kids love all cedarmont videos.  They are all great!  They make Bible songs come alive in this video.  You'll never go wrong with these.  My daughter is 6 and son is 3.  They've been watching them since birth.

Though this dvd seems to be a bit dated....my 2.5 year old son watches is closely and is even learning some of the songs.  I like the idea of my child learning songs that will write goodness and truth upon their heart rather than the stupid nursery rhyms like 3 blind mice!!  Have you ever listened to the words of that stuff we grew up on??  It's no wonder our culture is going to hell in a handbasket!  :-)
Great DVD.  It also has a preview of 9 additional songs so its like you're getting twice as much music for the same price.
